tourBios.curYrHigh: Earned one of the last two fully exempt positions for the PGA TOUR China Series' season when he finished T14 with Jooneob Son at the Second Global Qualifying Tournament at CTS Tycoon GC in February in Shenzhen.
tourBios.carHigh:
2014: At the Japan Golf Tour's Second Qualifying Tournament, didn't qualify. 
2012: Played in one Japan Golf Tour event, the Toshin Golf Tournament in Ryosen but missed the cut.Â

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA Tour China Serie was 5th in 2015 at the Yulongwan Yunnan Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 90th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the PGA Tour China Series.
